byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Rhodesian troops welcomed in Egypt; Gilbraltar illus
snippet: CAIRO, Egypt, April 30--"Our one ambition is to become competent combatant soldiers in the Allied cause," said Colonel N.S. Ferris, commanding the contingent of Rhodesian troops that arrived in Egypt today....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: RHODESIAN TROOPS WELCOMED IN EGYPT; Volunteers Will Be Split Up in Middle Eastern Army

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, April 30--"Our one ambition is to become competent combatant soldiers in the Allied cause," said Colonel N.S. Ferris, commanding the contingent of Rhodesian troops that arrived in Egypt today.
